title: SOLD: 1887-90 N172 Old Judge - Ed Delahanty HOF RC (SGC 20)
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1887-90 N172 Old Judge - Ed Delahanty HOF RC (SGC 20)
posts.post_content:
Good Evening, Collectors:

Up for sale today is a highly desireable 1887-90 N172 Old Judge - Ed Delahanty HOF Rookie Card which has been graded an SGC 20 by the strict graders at Sportscard Guaranty Company, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review scans of the front and back of the card for condition details. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
Beauty Phil.  If not for the writing it'd be a 4ish.  Best of luck in the sale.
